鶯: (おう) - Nightingale , Japanese bush warbler (Difone Horornis), Japanese nightingale; having a beautiful voice
鶯嬢: (うぐいすじょう) - female announcer; woman who makes public announcements (e.g. from an election campaign truck)
鶯張り: (うぐいすばり) - nightingale (flooring); method of laying floors to deliberately make a noise (like a nightingale's call) when walked across (security feature)
鶯神楽: (ウグイスカグラ) - Lonicera gracilipes (species of honeysuckle)
鶯菜: (ウグイスナ) - young greens (of mizuna, Japanese mustard spinach, rape, etc.)
鶯貝: (ウグイスガイ) - Pteria brevialata (species of wing oyster)
鶯餅: (うぐいすもち) - mochi filled with red bean paste and topped with green soy flour
鶲: (ひたき) - Crested Flycatcher , Old World flycatcher (qualquer pássaro da família Muscicapinae, especialmente os típicos papa-moscas da subfamília Muscicapinae)
鶴: (tsuru) - crane , crane (qualquer ave da família Gruidae, especialmente o grou-de-coroa-vermelha, Grus japonensis)
鶴の一声: (つるのひとこえ) - final word; voice of authority; authoritative pronouncement
鶴の子餅: (つるのこもち) - red and white egg-shaped mochi
鶴は千年亀は万年: (つるはせんねんかめはまんねん) - Cranes live for 1000 years, turtles live for 10,000 years
鶴亀: (つるかめ) - crane and tortoise (symbol of longevity, artistic motif)
鶴亀算: (つるかめざん) - obtaining the respective numbers of cranes and tortoises from the total of their heads and legs; calculating the values of two unknown quantities from their unit total and the total of one of their attributes
鶴来る: (つるきたる) - migration of cranes to their nesting grounds
鶴科: (つるか) - Gruidae; bird family comprising the cranes
鶴首して待つ: (かくしゅしてまつ) - to wait expectantly; to wait with a craned (outstretched) neck
鶸: (じゃく) - Siskin , cardueline finch (qualquer tentilhão da subfamília Carduelinae, especialmente o verdilhão-europeu, Carduelis spinus)
鶺鴒: (セキレイ) - any bird of family Motacillidae (excluding the pipits); wagtail; longclaw
鷓鴣: (シャコ) - francolin (partridge-like bird of genus Francolinus); partridge (of genus Perdix)
鷦鷯: (ミソサザイ) - (also written with the ateji 三十三才) winter wren (Troglodytes troglodytes)
鷲づかみ: (わしづかみ) - grabbing hold; eagle grip; tight hold
鷲掴み: (わしづかみ) - grabbing hold; eagle grip; tight hold
鷲木菟: (ワシミミズク) - Eurasian eagle owl (Bubo bubo)
鷲鼻: (わしばな) - aquiline nose; Roman nose; hook nose
鷸蚌: (いっぽう) - a snipe and a clam; a snipe and a mussel
鷸蚌の争い: (いつぼうのあらそい) - while two dogs are fighting for a bone, a third runs away with it; the fight between the snipe and the clam (ends in the fisherman's profit)
鷸駝鳥: (シギダチョウ) - tinamou (any bird of family Tinamidae)
鷹の爪: (タカノツメ) - Gamblea innovans (species of deciduous tree); extremely spicy form of chili pepper; variety of high-quality green tea
鷹の羽鯛: (タカノハダイ) - spottedtail morwong (Goniistius zonatus)
鷹化して鳩となる: (たかけしてはととなる) - one of the 72 climates (from the 11th of the second lunar month until the 15th)
鷹柱: (たかばしら) - group of buzzards (etc.) rising in an updraft (before the southward autumn migration)
鷺笛: (サギフエ) - longspine snipefish (Macroramphosus scolopax); common bellowsfish; snipe-fish; snipefish; spine trumpet fish; trumpetfish
鷺苔: (サギゴケ) - Miquel's mazus (species of small flowering plant, Mazus miquelii)
鷽替: (うそかえ) - annual religious ceremony that occurs in Tenmangu where worshippers come to exchange their wooden bullfinch birds
鸊鷉: (カイツブリ) - little grebe (Tachybaptus ruficollis); grebe (any waterbird of family Podicipedidae)
鸚哥: (インコ) - true parrot (esp. small parrots such as the parakeet, lory and conure)
鸚鵡病: (おうむびょう) - psittacosis; parrot fever
鸚鵡貝: (オウムガイ) - chambered nautilus (esp. species Nautilus pompilius)
鸚鵡返し: (おうむがえし) - parroting another's words
鸞: (らん) - Fabulous Mythical Bird , luan (pássaro mítico chinês)
鸞鏡: (らんけい) - mirror with a mythical Chinese bird carved into the back; (らんけい only)  (in Japan) 9th note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. A sharp)
鹹水: (かんすい) - brackish water; brine; salt water
鹹草: (アシタバ) - Angelica keiskei (species of angelica, a herb of the parsley family)
鹽花: (しおばな) - (塩花, 鹽花 only)  purifying salt; (塩花, 鹽花 only) pile of salt placed by the door of a shop or restaurant; whitecap
鹿: (shika) - deer , deer (especialmente o veado-sika, Cervus nippon), cervid
鹿せんべい: (しかせんべい) - rice crackers for feeding the deer (in Nara)
鹿の子: (かのこ) - cloth dyed in a dappled pattern; pattern of white spots/dapples; mochi containing red bean paste; (original meaning)  fawn
鹿の子斑: (かのこまだら) - pattern of white spots; dapples
鹿の子絞: (かのこしぼり) - cloth dyed in a dapple pattern
鹿の子絞り: (かのこしぼり) - cloth dyed in a dapple pattern
鹿の子餅: (かのこもち) - mochi containing red bean paste
鹿の角切り: (しかのつのきり) - Deer-Antler-Cutting Ceremony (held in Nara between late October and early November)
鹿を追う者は山を見ず: (しかをおうものはやまをみず) - You cannot see the wood for trees
鹿垣: (ししがき) - branch-twined hedge around a field to keep out wild boars and deer; abatis
鹿威し: (ししおどし) - water-filled bamboo tube which clacks against a stone when emptied; device for scaring birds from gardens
鹿子の木: (カゴノキ) - Litsea coreana (species of tree in the laurel family)
鹿子絞り: (かのこしぼり) - cloth dyed in a dapple pattern
鹿尾菜: (ヒジキ) - hijiki (dark edible seaweed usu. sold in dried black strips; Hizikia fusiformis)
鹿島立ち: (かしまだち) - to set upon a journey; to start travelling; to set off on a trip
